desc: KnowAtom is a complete full-year hands-on science and engineering program. Our eCommerce site makes grade-specific packaged options available for exceptional learning outside the traditional classroom in parent organized discovery (PODs), home school, small schools, and teacher led co-op settings. Engage your students.

layout.text: Complete K8 NGSS Science Programs with Lab Kits for Homeschool, School, and PODs

Engage students in a full year of hand-on inquiry-based learning with KnowAtom’s NGSS science programs for home, school, and POD. Our grade-specific packages deliver every single activity, lesson, material, and test tube you need to start teaching your elementary or middle school student immediately.
